publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1712 Duncan McNeil on behalf of the Local Government and Communities Committee: Planning Application Processes (Menie Estate)—That the Parliament notes the conclusions and recommendations contained in the Local Government and Communities Committee’s 5th Report, 2008 (Session 3): Planning Application Processes (Menie Estate) (SP Paper 73).

S3M-1712 Duncan McNeil on behalf of the Local Government and Communities Committee: Report on Planning Application Processes (Menie Estate)—That the Parliament notes the conclusions and recommendations contained in the Local Government and Communities Committee’s 5th Report, 2008 (Session 3): Planning Application Processes (Menie Estate) (SP Paper 73).
